basics.name: Lucas Giovanni Uberti-Bona Marin
basics.label: PhD Candidate at Law and Tech lab
basics.summary:
Studying a Msc in Artificial Intelligence while I work at tuOtempO. In my position I strive to bring value and clarity for decision-making through the use of data and predictive/prescriptive techniques. 

Heavily invested in effectively communicating and implementing data-driven solutions that can drive change, specially in people's and the environment's health.

work.name: Maastricht University
work.summary: I am a PhD candidate at Maastricht University's Law and tech lab, working on the Regtech4AI project under the supervision of Konrad Kollnig.

work.name: tuOtempO
work.summary:
As a data scientist in tuOtempO my responsibilities are threefold:

* I develop AI modules for our product such as fuzzy mappings or conversational agents
* I develop, collect and analyze product KPIs for stakeholders in key areas such as customer engagement
* I am part of the Business Intelligence team, striving to derive meaningful and actionable insights to improve our internal processes.


I am the go-to person when it comes to advanced data analysis, also being critically involved in most processes involving data, from its collection stages, to the documentation, retrieval and analysis.

work.name: Maastricht University
work.summary: In my role as scientific programmer I worked in the EU funded project FAIRplus, where I collaborated in the development of tools and guidelines for making life science data FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable).

work.name: PNA
work.summary: I worked for PNA for my internship as part of the ke@work program part of my studies at Maastricht University. I obtained an average GPA of 9.4 in my semester and final assessment.

work.name: Teleperformance
work.summary: I worked as a Customer and Technical support agent for Adobe in Spanish and Italian. As such I handled people of all ages with questions of all kinds and I developed the ability to understand someone's problems and help them find a solution.

education.score: 8.6 GPA with a 8.5 on Msc Thesis
8.4 GPA with a 9.5 on Bsc thesis (best thesis award)
